docs.lead_paragraph: Officials said Wednesday they had allotted $3.5 million to expand early childhood education in Flint, where contaminated drinking water has been linked to elevated levels of lead in children’s blood.

headline.main: Michigan: Head Start Aid Approved for Flint
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Head Start Aid Approved for Flint

docs.snippet: Officials said Wednesday they had allotted $3.5 million to expand early childhood education in Flint, where contaminated drinking water has been linked to elevated levels of lead in children’s blood.

docs.lead_paragraph: An official of a dairy association says G.M.O. products are safe and that any labeling rules should be national, not state by state.
docs.snippet: An official of a dairy association says G.M.O. products are safe and that any labeling rules should be national, not state by state.

docs.lead_paragraph: You know you need to exercise more, but there's always next week, or the week after. To entice you to stop procrastinating, your company or insurer might soon reward you for wearing a fitness device to track your steps, heart rate and more.

headline.main: Let Your Boss Track Your Fitness, Get an Apple Watch
headline.print_headline: Let Your Boss Track Your Fitness, Get an Apple Watch

docs.snippet: You know you need to exercise more, but there's always next week, or the week after. To entice you to stop procrastinating, your company or insurer might soon reward you for wearing a fitness device to track your steps, heart rate and more.

docs.lead_paragraph: The innovative Copenhagen restaurant opens a pop-up in Sydney.

headline.main: In Australia, Noma Forages for Ingredients and Inspiration

docs.abstract: Copenhagen, Denmark, restaurant Noma opens 10-week pop-up restaurant in Sydney, drawing on ingredients foraged in Australia.
docs.snippet: The innovative Copenhagen restaurant opens a pop-up in Sydney.

docs.lead_paragraph: The law, which would require chain restaurants to label high-sodium items, was to go into effect on Tuesday, but will be delayed while it remains under judicial review.

headline.main: Judge Grants Delay of Sodium Warnings for New York City Restaurants

docs.abstract: Appeals court grants National Restaurant Assn's request for temporary halt to New York City's enforcement of measure requiring some chain restaurants to post high sodium warnings on menus; court is expected to offer opinion on matter in March.
docs.snippet: The law, which would require chain restaurants to label high-sodium items, was to go into effect on Tuesday, but will be delayed while it remains under judicial review.
